stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Phishing Email Spoofing Israeli Government Sends Malicious URL
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description:
On 22 April 2014 a phishing email from a previously identified malicious sender address "knessetspokesperson@gmail.com" was observed. The sender address is associated with targeting U.S. government employees with Xtreme RAT in the past. The email spoofed the Israeli Legislative branch of the government and contained shortened link to a malicious URL.
Malicious payload could not be retrieved.
Please see IB-13-10807, IB-13-10842A, and IB-14-10026 for additional information on "knessetspokesperson@gmail.com".

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
Time Received: 4/22/2014 10:14 AM Sender: Knesset Spokesperson Return-Path: Subject: (very important) : Analysis of Attacks in the Last week Exploit Description: HTML link utilizing Google shortener (goo.gl) to dropbox.com Shortened http://goo.gl/[redacted] Unshortened: https://dl-web.dropbox.com/get/Analysis.rar?_[redacted] ----- BEGIN EMAIL BODY ----- Download the important PDF file from : www.knesset.gov.il/analysis.pdf -- Knesset Spokesperson knessetspokesperson@gmail.com knessetspokesperson@knesset.gov.il Tel : 6408743 Fax : 6496191 ----- END EMAIL BODY ----- ----- BEGIN EMAIL BODY - HTML -----

Download the important PDF file from : www.knesset.gov.il/analysis.pdf


--
Knesset Spokesperson
knessetspokesperson@gmail.com
knessetspokesperson@knesset.gov.il
Tel : 6408743
Fax : 6496191
